name: Hurry Office
description:
Hi, Welcome to Hurry office !
A fps game in wich you have to find your smartphone in the office in less than 90 seconds. In such a rush, things are going to be messy ! Nothing must stop you for fiding it ! Don't hesitate to take and throw the objects out of your way !

All the controls are explained when you lanch the game.

I made this game alone during the Global Game Jam of 2021, the theme was "Lost and founds".

I used Unity, with the Polygon - Office pack of Synty Store and some musics.

Music list:

  • Airbourne - Live it Up
  • Batmobile - Go satan go
  • Batmobile - Hammering
  • Chuck Berry - Johnny B Goode
  • Gun's Roses - Welcome to the jungle
  • Rob Zombie - Superbeast
  • Rob Zombie - Two lane backtop
  • Wolfmother - Woman
